powergrid.model.world

Class Door

  • java.lang.Object
    • powergrid.model.GameObject
      • powergrid.model.world.Door
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Interactable

    public class Door
extends GameObject
implements Interactable
    Class representing a Door in the RSBot environment.

    Doors are different from gates in that they usually cover only one tile, and they have different states (open and close). Gates only have one state, and always require an interact() command to pass through.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Door

        public Door(int x,
    int y,
    int z,
    int rawValue)
        Creates a new Door at the given position. the rawNumber indicates the type of object as provided by the RSBot environment.
        Parameters:
        x - the x-coordinate of this object
        y - the y-coordinate of this object
        z - the z-coordinate of this object
        rawValue - the raw value from the environment specifying the type

    • Method Detail

      • interact

        public void interact()
              throws OutOfReachException
        Performs the default interaction on the door.

        Use the open() and close() methods to ensure a specific door state

        Specified by:
        interact in interface Interactable
        Throws:
        OutOfReachException - when the door could not be interacted with

          throws OutOfReachException
        Tries to open the door.
        Throws:
        OutOfReachException - when the door could not be opened

      • close

        public void close()
           throws OutOfReachException
        Tries to close the door.
        Throws:
        OutOfReachException - when the door could not be closed

      • interact

        public void interact(java.lang.String method)
              throws OutOfReachException
        Interacts with this door.

        The following actions are supported:

        • open
        • close
        • examine
        Specified by:
        interact in interface Interactable
        Parameters:
        method - the method of interaction with this door
        Throws:
        java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException - when the given method is not supported
        OutOfReachException - when the door could not be reached

      • stateIsOpen

        public boolean stateIsOpen()
        returns whether this door is opened.
